requirements.scenario: Verify that user can successfully fill out the student registration form with valid data

test_steps.step: Enter valid first name in the 'First Name' field
Enter valid last name in the 'Last Name' field
Enter valid email address in the 'Email' field
Select 'Male' gender option
Enter valid 10-digit mobile number in the 'Mobile Number' field
Select a valid date of birth in the 'Date of Birth' field
Select 'Sports' and 'Music' as hobbies
Upload a valid picture
Enter valid current address in the 'Current Address' field
Select 'NCR' as State and 'Delhi' as City
Click on the 'Submit' button

requirements.scenario: Verify that validation messages are displayed for each field when submitting the form with invalid data

test_steps.step: Leave the 'First Name' field empty
Leave the 'Email' field empty
Select 'Female' gender option without selecting 'Male' or 'Other'
Enter an invalid mobile number (less than 10 digits) in the 'Mobile Number' field
Select an invalid date of birth in the 'Date of Birth' field
Submit the form without selecting any hobbies
Submit the form without uploading a picture
Leave the 'Current Address' field empty
Select 'Select State' and 'Select City' without choosing any options
Click on the 'Submit' button
